answer:
BC Children's Hospital Family Immunization Clinic currently provides all publicly-funded immunizations at no cost to patients at BC Children's and BC Women's and their friends and family visiting the hospital. Please contact the clinic directly with any questions. All health units in BC provide re immunization post stem cell transplant. Use the health unit finder. 
Immunization Nurse
question: Does the BC Children's Hospital Clinic offer Reimmunization Post Stem Cell Transplant?
